text: Great pizza for a great price. The pan pizza dough cooked perfectly crispy and no undercooked spots. The top of the pizza only just a slight char around the edges.

text: I just enjoy the greasy food. It‚Äôs takeout pizza, my expectations are already set low.

name: Eric Mann
text: Ordered in store, fast preparation, friendly service. Pizza tastes great! Much prefer their style over some of the other local pizza places.

name: Glenn Wilson Jr
text: I used to love this place. But after my last experience I'll never order here again. One pizza and a salad should not have taken over 3 hours to make. It was for delivery but after two hours I decided to just pick it up myself. Online said ‚Ä¶More

text: Placed an order at 2:30pm for delivery at 5pm for the kids. It didn‚Äôt show up till 5:32pm. I tried calling them from 5:15-5:30 to only get an answering machine and then to be disconnected by it. Asked them to at least credit me the delivery cost but they did not even bother to reply. Not recommend

name: Amanda McCall
text: Wonderful pizza with fast friendly service!  We ordered it twice during our 5 night stay in boulder!  Definitely do the deep dish!  Yum!!  Best chicken bacon ranch pizza I have yet to have!!!

text: Only ordered a couple times but every time the delivery is missing something. Like tonight I didnt get my soda or my extra sauce.

text: Do NOT order online! Actually don't eat here at all, go to cosmos instead! My coworker and I ordered a large pizza for lunch to share, which we placed through their "order online" link. text: I got delivery last night and after I opened up the box I realized that there were no sauces that I ordered and payed for. Also the pizza was not cut at all. Not even an attempt. So after cutting the pizza myself I can easily say I'll never order anything from this restaurant again

text: Terrible experience! I ordered successfully online and waited for 2 hours. In the end, they canceled my order for no reason until I tracked my order!!!!! They never called when the order was canceled.

name: Anna Luna
text: Worst service ever. Order my pizza 1 hr ahead so it will arrive on time it was for delivery it took about 2hr and a half and when the pizza arrived it was flipped up side down and didn‚Äôt look like a pizza. Looked so grows that I just toss it. NEVER AGAIN ORDERING FROM HERE.

name: George Wolanin
text: Pizza was delicious, surprisingly cheap and the staff was very friendly upon calling and entering.  Very pleased with this place while vacationing!

name: Carol Hastings
text: Black Jack's Pizza on Walnut in Boulder is fantastic!  Their salads are better than any fine restaurants; especially the mediterranean.  The pizzas are exactly as you order them.

name: andup123
text: Waited almost two hours(7:30 - 9:10pm) for my order to come in, just to call and find out they hadn't even made it for whatever reason. All I got was a sorry. I was hesitant to order from this place tonight because of prior experiences, and tonight was just confirmation this place sucks.

name: Ashton Mitchell
text: If you live at two nine north and you're drunk this place is super convenient. Post drunk day pizza was not so delicious though.

text: There is better pizza out there (Protos in North Boulder, for example) but, Blackjack is a good choice for late night delivery. It is greasy, cheesy and full of carbs. Sometimes, that is exactly what you want.

text: If your hungry and want food on time; order from somewhere else. I've waited the said hour and twenty minutes and I'm starving! All I wanted was a pizza. Service in the states is going third world. Damn you Blackjack Pizza... Damn you America!
